Package org.cesecore.util

Class RFC4683Tools

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cesecore.util.RFC4683Tools
  • public final class RFC4683Tools
extends Object
    Helper class to handle operations for RFC4683 certificate extension Subject Identification method (SIM) for including a privacy-sensitive identifier in the subjectAltName extension of a certificate. The SIM is an optional feature that may be used by relying parties to determine whether the subject of a particular certificate is also the person corresponding to a particular sensitive identifier (@see RFC4683.)
    Version:
    $Id: RFC4683Tools.java 31882 2019-03-18 13:50:56Z anatom $

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static String LIST_SEPARATOR
      List separator to separate the SIM tokens in the internal storage format (also has to be entered by the user).
      static String SUBJECTIDENTIFICATIONMETHOD
      Label for SIM rendered in the certificate.
      static String SUBJECTIDENTIFICATIONMETHOD_OBJECTID
      OID for SIM written into the certificate.

      • generateSimForInternalSanFormat

        public static final String generateSimForInternalSanFormat​(String san)
                                                    throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                                           NoSuchProviderException,
                                                           NoSuchAlgorithmException
        This method reads the internal storage format for SAN. If the SAN contains SIM parameters (list of 4 tokens, separated by '::'), the parameters are replaced by the generated SIM strings (list of 3 tokens, separated by '::') generateInternalSimString(String, String, String, String)
        Parameters:
        san - the SAN string in internal storage format with SIM as user parameters.
        Returns:
        SAN string in internal storage format with generated SIM strings.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - on illegal request
        NoSuchProviderException - If provider not found
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - If algorithm not found

      • generateInternalSimString

        public static final String generateInternalSimString​(String hashAlogrithmOidString,
                                                     String userChosenPassword,
                                                     String ssiType,
                                                     String ssi)
                                              throws IllegalArgumentException,
                                                     NoSuchProviderException,
                                                     NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Creates a '::' separated string of hashAlogrithmOidString, Authority Random (R) and Privacy-Enhanced Protected Subject Information (PEPSI). Note: RFC4683 Subject Identification Method (SIM = R || PEPSI), and PEPSI = H(H( P || R || SIItype || SII)). The resulting String is used for internal storage. Where R is the Authority Random hash and PEPSI the Privacy-Enhanced Protected Subject Information: PEPSI = H(H( P || R || SIItype || SII)) Where P is the user chosen password, SSI the Sensitive Identification Information and SIIType its type.
        Parameters:
        hashAlogrithmOidString - i.e '1.3.14.3.2.26' for SHA-1
        userChosenPassword - (P) FIPS 112 and FIPS 180-1 compliant password up to 28 characters (see https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4683#section-4.2)
        ssiType - OID string of an SSI type (see https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4683#section-4.1).
        ssi - Sensitive Identification Information (SII) (see https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4683#section-4.1).
        Returns:
        a '::' separated string of hashAlogrithmOidString, R and PEPSI.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - on illegal request
        NoSuchProviderException - If provider not found
        NoSuchAlgorithmException - If algorithm not found

      • createSimGeneralName

        public static final org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1Primitive createSimGeneralName​(String hashAlgorithmIdentifier,
                                                                             String authorityRandom,
                                                                             String pepsi)
        Creates a SIM GeneralName by the internal SIM storage format ('hashAlgorithmOIDString::R::PEPSI') SIM ::= SEQUENCE { hashAlg AlgorithmIdentifier, authorityRandom OCTET STRING, -- RA-chosen random number -- used in computation of -- pEPSI pEPSI OCTET STRING -- hash of HashContent -- with algorithm hashAlg }
        Parameters:
        hashAlgorithmIdentifier - the OID string for the hash algorithm used to hash R and PEPSI.
        authorityRandom - the registration authority chosen random value, hashed with hash of hashAlogrithmOidString (see https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc4683#section-4.3).
        pepsi - Privacy-Enhanced Protected Subject Information (PEPSI), with SIM = R || PEPSI.
        Returns:
        the RFC4683 SIM GeneralName (@see RFC4683.).

      • getSimStringSequence

        public static String getSimStringSequence​(org.bouncycastle.asn1.ASN1Sequence sequence)
        Helper method for getting the SIM name from SAN ASN.1 sequence.
        Parameters:
        sequence - the OtherName sequence
        Returns:
        the SIM string by the otherName.

        Returns:
